channel.title: Need help adding Middle Mouse Camera Movement
channel.description:
The client i have does not have the middle mouse button feature that moves the camera angle.
Anyone have the code or tutorial on how to add it? im still learning, so please help if you can :)

item.title: Need help adding Middle Mouse Camera Movement
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I know you’re new here but when you ask a question, try and get it into the right board.

This is the server help section - we tend to help with your server.
You asked a client question - the client is widely different than the server (While they’re both wrote in java ;P).

A quick google search (See the link in my signature for tips on “googling effectively”) yielded this as a result:
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/552017-middle-mouse-movement.html]middle mouse movement - Rune Server[url]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding Middle Mouse Camera Movement
